explains: adj. 湿透的；（溶液）饱和的，（有机分子）饱和的；充满的；（颜色）深的
v. 使湿透；使充满；使（化学溶液）饱和（saturate的过去式和过去分词）
wordGroup: saturated fatty acid 饱和脂肪酸，去油
saturated vapor pressure n. 饱和蒸汽压
be saturated with 被…所饱和；充满着
saturated zone 饱和区；饱和带；饱和层

sentences.en: Fish oils are less saturated than animal fats.
sentences.cn: 鱼油不如动物脂肪饱和。

sentences.en: Snack food market is largely saturated, and to grow.
sentences.cn: 休闲食品市场基本饱和，并呈增长趋势。

sentences.en: Parents eat the equivalent of almost a pepperoni pizza of saturated fat each week.
sentences.cn: 父母每周吃进肚里的饱和脂肪数量相当于一个辣香肠比萨饼内的含量。
